WorkItem.ClosedComment: Can you post some code that reproduces this issue? Thanks
WorkItem.Description:
I recently work on ASP>NET MVC 4 BackBone.js SPA template, before install TypeScript, the template runs fine, create account, login account no problem. 

Since ts file doesnot create js on save, so I downloaded and installed latest version of typescript, it can generate js on save, but crash membership related section every time. 

Later on I found that generated .js file has these lines as unrecognized (error message: Microsoft JScript runtime error: 'Helpers' is undefined):

Helpers.subscribeModelInvalidEvent(model, this.$el);

But before install typescript, the file is sth like this:

Views.Helpers.subscribeModelInvalidEvent(model, this.$el);

So I think this might be caused by new version of compiler omit to have proper scope.
